## Vault.copy() method

Create a copy of the selected file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
copy(file: TFile, newPath: string): Promise<TFile>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | [`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md) | The file |
|  <code>newPath</code> | <code>string</code> | Vault absolute path for the new copy. |

`Promise``<`[`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md)`>`
